Articles.Content: It occurred to me that a short while back, you could stack Launch Stabilizers (The big towering red things that hold your rocket off the ground), I noticed a few versions back that you cant do that anymore, if a Launch Stabilizer was in one place on the ground, you cant put another one there. Could you make it so that you can do that again?
You can still do it, you may need to jiggle them a bit before they go green and you can snap them on though

You can still do it, you may need to jiggle them a bit before they go green and you can snap them on though

oh I never have seen it do that since a few versions back
Alt+f12 opens the debug menu. Turn part clipping on. Bob's ur uncle.

Bob's ur uncle.

Bob's ur uncle?

Bob's ur uncle?

Its a british thing, it means "now wasn't that easy".
